```{Rcpp}
// [[Rcpp::depends(RcppEigen)]]
#include <RcppEigen.h>

using namespace Rcpp;
using namespace Eigen;

void testmap(const MatrixXd & X) {
  std::cout << "Test" << std::endl;
}

// [[Rcpp::export(testcpp)]]
void testcpp(SEXP XX, NumericMatrix ZZ) {
  const Map<MatrixXd> X(as<Map<MatrixXd>>(XX));
  testmap(X);
  const MatrixXd & Y = X;
  std::cout << "Y is\n" << Y << std::endl;
  const Map<MatrixXd> Z(as<Map<MatrixXd>>(ZZ));
  std::cout << "Z is\n" << Z << std::endl;
}

// [[Rcpp::export(testtype)]]
void testtype() {
  SEXP type = R_NilValue;
  if(TYPEOF(type)==NILSXP){
    std::cout << "TRUE" << std::endl;
  } else {
    std::cout << "FALSE" << std::endl;
  }
}

// [[Rcpp::export(testlist)]]
SEXP testlist() {
  VectorXd v = VectorXd::Random(4);
  List l = List::create(_["vec"]=v,_["way"]="TEST");
  std::cout << TYPEOF(l) << std::endl;
  return l;
}
```

```{r}
m = 10
X0 <- matrix(rnorm(m*3), m, 3)
X1 <- matrix(rnorm(m*3, 3), m, 3)
X2 <- matrix(rnorm(m*3, -3), m, 3)
Y <- c(rep(0,m), rep(1,m), rep(2,m))
X <- rbind(X0,X1,X2)
train_ind = sample(m*3)
X <- X[train_ind,]
Y <- Y[train_ind]
l = 50
X0_new <- matrix(rnorm(l*3),l,3)
X1_new <- matrix(rnorm(l*3, 3),l,3)
X2_new <- matrix(rnorm(l*3, -3),l,3)
X_new <- rbind(X0_new, X1_new, X2_new)
Y_new <- c(rep(0,l),rep(1,l),rep(2,l))
s <- 10; r <- 3
K <- 10
J <- 3
```

```{r}
Y_pred_lae <- fit_lae_logit_mult_gp(X, Y, X_new, J, s, r, K)
Y_pred_lae_rcpp <- fit_lae_logit_mult_gp_rcpp(X, Y, X_new, s, r, K)
Y_pred_se <- fit_se_logit_mult_gp(X, Y, X_new, J, s, r, K)
Y_pred_se_rcpp <- fit_se_logit_mult_gp_rcpp(X,Y,X_new,s,r,K)
Y_pred_nystrom_rcpp <- fit_nystrom_logit_mult_gp_rcpp(X,Y,X_new,s,K)
Y_pred_gl_rcpp <- fit_gl_logit_mult_gp_rcpp(X,Y,X_new,K,threshold = 0.1)
```

```{r}
error_rate(Y_new, Y_pred_lae)
error_rate(Y_new, Y_pred_lae_rcpp)
error_rate(Y_new, Y_pred_se)
error_rate(Y_new, Y_pred_se_rcpp)
error_rate(Y_new, Y_pred_nystrom_rcpp)
error_rate(Y_new, Y_pred_gl_rcpp)
```



```{r}
microbenchmark(fit_lae_logit_mult_gp={fit_lae_logit_mult_gp(X, Y, X_new, J, s, r, K)},
               fit_lae_logit_mult_gp_rcpp={fit_lae_logit_mult_gp_rcpp(X, Y, X_new, s, r, K)},
               times = 1)
```
